text: The 1988 Fidelity Unit Trusts International Open was a professional ranking snooker tournament that took place from August to September 1988 at Trentham Gardens in Stoke-on-Trent, England. Steve Davis retained the title by defeating Jimmy White 12–6 in the final. __TOC__ ==Main draw== ==References== Category:Scottish Open (snooker) Category:1988 in snooker Category:1988 in English sport Category:Sport in Stoke-on-Trent International Open International Open
title: 1988 International Open
